rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('will produce up to 14.9 million tons', 'represents an annual output increase') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
Segment reports financial/trade metrics, which are excluded from Q3.
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports positive economic projections but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes future possibility/projection ('will produce up to 14.9 million tons') without active reassurance.
